body_text: What's the big difference between how classifier is defined and how the rest of the apps are defined? normandy.classifier vs normandy.control.apps.ControlApp.  Should this be defined more like classifier, since it's really just going to be some views and templates built off of pre-existing apps?
body: What's the big difference between how classifier is defined and how the rest of the apps are defined? `normandy.classifier` vs `normandy.control.apps.ControlApp`.  Should this be defined more like classifier, since it's really just going to be some views and templates built off of pre-existing apps?
